security.tls.v1_3.desc: Verify the device supports TLS 1.3 (as a client)

security.tls.v1_2.desc: Verify the device supports TLS 1.2 (as a client)

security.tls.v1.desc: Verify the device supports TLS 1.0 (as a client)

security.x509.desc: Verify the devices supports RFC 2459 - Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Certificate and CRL Profile
